snippet.title: Vespera Bononia | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Vespera Bononia is a game about adventure, magic and exploration. Set in an everchanging city engulfed by nightmares, it brings adrenaline magical combat to a roguelite character development.

Wishlist on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2843680/

Discover Power Up Team here: https://power-up-team.com/
